addonManifest.name: Amazon Media Encoder
addonManifest.description: Amazon Elastic Transcoder is media transcoding in the cloud. It is designed to be a highly scalable, easy to use and a cost effective way for developers and businesses to convert (or “transcode”) media files from their source format into versions that will playback on devices like smartphones, tablets and PCs.
addonManifest.author: Chris Dutra

property.description: If set to true, each developer will need to provide their own Amazon credentials.
